thread.section_title: Hotel Chaplain Rive Gauche - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Stay - Review
thread.title_full: Great Stay - Review of Hotel Chaplain Rive Gauche, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Jackie S
title: Great Stay - Review
text:
There is no better recommendation than a return visit.
This is our 4th stay at Hotel Chaplain.
Location is ideal, very near Montparnasse, Luxembourg Gardens, walking distance to Saint Germain.
Metro Vavin just round the corner.
Plenty of great eateries, plenty of shops as well.
Hotel is very modern, clean , spacious.
Staff are very friendly and speak very good English.
Definitely one of our favourite hotels
